ygData.subject: something to check in Akanon...
ygData.msgSnippet: looks like we have our own version of the famed switch of erollisi... one of the little glowing green stars on a pedestal makes a door noise when clicked...the
ygData.messageBody:
looks like we have our own version of the famed switch of erollisi...
one of the little glowing green stars on a pedestal makes a door noise when
clicked...the one that doesn't spin, near Guide I by the water in the cavern
with the PoD...
from what i could tell, all of the stars can be clicked, as they give the
'you can't reach that' message when clicked from a distance, but
only the one does anything...
searched the zone for a while with a friend clicking the star, but didn't
find anything :( mebbe one of you will have more luck with it...
also tried the Red V, C series clockwork, and obsolete duster quests but got
no new info...anyone remember where the akanon quest to kill the duster in
kaladim starts?

Xillitil/Povar
